## Solicitation Details

## Procurement Overview
This solicitation details a Request for Proposal for Commercial Security Guard and Related Services. The procurement is based on a Trade Agreement between Canada and its trade partners.

#### Trade Agreement
A Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this solicitation.

## Beneficial Owner Information
The beneficial owner of this procurement is the **Public Health Agency of Canada**.

#### Location
The agency is located at 130 Colonnade Road in Ottawa, Ontario.
